QuestData.Title: Cryin' My Eyes Out
QuestData.Description: I coulda taken out da whole lot of 'em, mon.$b$bShot 'em one by one, den played dead when dey be gettin' close. Fell for it every time, dey did - well almost every time...$b$bOne of 'em finally got wise. Called my bluff. Before I knew it, dey was usin' my eyes as marbles.$b$bRan off with my goods an' left me here ta die, da savages...$b$bHelp me, mon. Lemme die wit my dignity intact.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Zin'Jun's belongings from the Hozen Groundpounders.$b$bIf you lose Zin'Jun, speak to him at the Ascent of Swirling Winds.
